dialogue.text: There, I gave you the harder challenge you wanted, anymore power and this universe would be in danger.
For being considered one of the ''Stronger'' Shaggy's, you clearly aren't holding up to that tittle.
Look, I'm only trying to keep everything at peace, I don't want to hurt anymore people than I already have.
Listen, we have been put in countless battles, most of which almost got us killed.
And hell, we even fought against 3 SHAGGY's, and you want to keep your power hidden just because you don't ''want to hurt anyone''
You know what, Fine. I'll show you something those 3 Shaggy's haven't showed you yet.
DON'T SAY I DIDN'T WARN YOU ABOUT THIS!
